name: AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode
desc: Constants that define the available microphone modes.

items.name: case standard
items.desc: A mode that processes microphone audio with standard voice DSP.

items.name: case wideSpectrum
items.desc: A mode that minimizes microphone audio processing to capture all sounds in the room.

items.name: case voiceIsolation
items.desc: A mode that processes microphone audio to isolate the voice and attenuate other signals.
